body_html:
Hi @ericxumit
I'm not a tensorflow pro either (yet). To me it looks like you need to install Visual Studio.
Simply google your error "Unable to find vcvarsall.bat" and find for example this one:
https://blogs.msdn.microsoft.com/pythonengineering/2016/04/11/unable-to-find-vcvarsall-bat/
